Package by.roma.telecom.dao

Interface AccountDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLAccountDao
    public interface AccountDao
    AccountDao is the main interface to provide guidelines for Account data manipulation and CRUD pathways.
    Since:
    10-18-2019
    Author:
    Roman

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Account addCallPlan​(int accountID, int callPlanID)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables, if account has an active call plan, that call plan will be ceased.
      Account blockAccount​(int accountID)
      Executes Update query.
      Account changePhoneNumber​(int accountID, java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables.
      Account chargeToAccount​(int accountID, float amount)
      Executes Update query.
      Account connectPhoneNumber​(int accountID, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables.
      Account findAccountByPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Select query.
      Account getAccountDetails​(int accountID)
      Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean Account type object.
      java.util.List<Account> getListOfAllAccounts()
      Executes Select query.
      Account unblockAccount​(int accountID)
      Executes Update query.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccountDetails

        Account getAccountDetails​(int accountID)
                   throws DaoException
        Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean Account type object.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • addCallPlan

        Account addCallPlan​(int accountID,
                    int callPlanID)
             throws DaoException
        Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables, if account has an active call plan, that call plan will be ceased. New call plan with callPlanID passed into the method will be assign to the account instead.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        callPlanID - Call plan id as an integer.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • connectPhoneNumber

        Account connectPhoneNumber​(int accountID,
                           java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                    throws DaoException
        Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables. Connects selected phone number to the account.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        phoneNumber - Phone number as String.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • changePhoneNumber

        Account changePhoneNumber​(int accountID,
                          java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
                   throws DaoException
        Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables. Ceases old phone number, updates it's status. Connects new phone number to the account.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        newPhoneNumber - Phone number as String.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • chargeToAccount

        Account chargeToAccount​(int accountID,
                        float amount)
                 throws DaoException
        Executes Update query. Updates account balance, returns updated bean Account object.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        amount - Amount of charge as float.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • blockAccount

        Account blockAccount​(int accountID)
              throws DaoException
        Executes Update query. Updates account blocked status, returns updated bean Account object.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • unblockAccount

        Account unblockAccount​(int accountID)
                throws DaoException
        Executes Update query. Updates account blocked status, returns updated bean Account object.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Account id as an integer.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • getListOfAllAccounts

        java.util.List<Account> getListOfAllAccounts()
                                      throws DaoException
        Executes Select query. Assembles list of all accounts from data base.
        Returns:
        Account type List.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.

      • findAccountByPhoneNumber

        Account findAccountByPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                          throws DaoException
        Executes Select query. Searches for an account with specific phone number that is passed into the method.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - Phone number as String.
        Returns:
        Account type object.
        Throws:
        DaoException - If SQLException occurs.
